name: Unforgotten Quest
blurb: Unforgotten Quest, a 2D CO-OP RPG. Loot, Levels, Skills, Classes, Quests, Bosses, Humor, Multiplayer, and most importantly, Time eater!

rewards.reward: No Reward
Bronze Tier:\r\nDigital download of the game when it is complete.
Bronze Tier:\r\nDigital download of the game and the game's soundtrack.
Bronze Tier:\r\nEarly access to Beta Builds and two extra copies to give to your friends. \r\n+All previous rewards in Bronze Tier.
Bronze Tier:\r\nDigital Download of Unforgotten Realms Season 1/2/3.\r\n+All previous rewards in Bronze Tier.
Silver Tier:\r\nBecome a Rock! Create a sell loot item(grey item) based off your username or your idea. \r\n+Everything in Bronze Tier.
Silver Tier: Become a Sword! Create a weapon, armor piece, or trinket based off your username or idea. +Everything in Bronze Tier!
Silver Tier: Become a Consumable! Create a potion or food item based off your username or idea that players will spend hours eating and drinking. You could be tasty! +Everything in Bronze Tier!
Silver Tier: Become a target dummy! We'll name a target dummy after you! Players will spend hours and hours testing their damage all over your face. Ow! \r\n+Everything in Bronze Tier.
Silver Tier: Become a Bridge! We'll name a bridge after you! Why on earth would you be a bridge?\r\n+Everything in Bronze Tier.

Silver Tier: Become a Trap! Design a trap that will catch, or even kill,
adventurers. Be the bane of hardcore players by creating a deadly
and sneaky trap for them to set off if they don’t search for you first! 
								     +Everything in the Bronze Tier
Gold Tier: Become an NPC! Create a custom npc to stand around town and repeat the same piece of dialogue over and over... forever! +Everything in Bronze Tier.
Gold Tier: Become a Body! Create an NPC that will be killed during a cut scene or in-game event. You get to die in a video game! +Everything in Bronze Tier.
Gold Tier: Become a Monster! Create a monster based after you or your ideas and proceed to be farmed over and over and over again! +Everything in Bronze Tier.
Silver Double Down. Select two non-restricted \u201cBecome\u201d\r\nSilver tier rewards. The cheaper alternative to the Silver Tier Bundle!\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t     +Everything in the Bronze Tier

Gold Tier: Become a Critter! Create a small animal based after you or your ideas with almost no hit points. There will be an achievement to find you and it will be really, really hard! +Everything in Bronze Tier.
Silver Bundle Tier:\r\nSelect two rewards from the Silver Tier (Excluding Bridge and Dummy) and receive a Roamin the Paladin T-Shirt as well! \r\n+Everything in Bronze Tier.
Gold Tier: Become a Quest NPC! Create a Quest NPC that gets to talk to a lot and aid players in their travels! +Everything in Bronze Tier.

Gold Tier: Become a Spell! Chose one of the six classes from Unforgotten
Quest and design an unlockable BONUS spell for that class
based on your name or ideas. You also get to choose how the spell 
is found by the players. You can get pretty crazy with these.
								     +Everything in the Bronze Tier
Gold Tier: Become an Elite Monster! Create a monster that will proceed to kill lots of players! +Everything in Bronze Tier.
Gold Double Down! Select any two non-restricted Gold and \r\nSilver tier rewards. The cheaper alternative to the Gold Tier Bundle!\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t     +Everything in the Bronze Tier

Gold Bundle Pack! Select two of the Gold Tier options (aside from critter and body) and one from the Silver Tier (aside from dummy and bridge) and receive a Roamin the Paladin T-Shirt and a signed copy of the first season of Unforgotten Realms.
Diamond Tier: Become a Legendary! Create a weapon, armor piece, trinket, or potion based on you or your ideas! +Everything in Bronze Tier.
Diamond Tier: Become a Boss! Create a boss monster that sits at the end of those dungeons and caves for players to practice their DPS on! +Everything in Bronze Tier.

Diamond Tier: Become a Legendary Set! Legendary Weapons, Armor,
or Trinkets are the BEST items in UQ and now you are going to create
a set of them to put into the game. Two Swords that, when matched,
have the power to shoot flames or maybe an entire set of armor 
named Steve’s Vestments, because your name is Steve and that’s all 
you could think of! Create a set of weapons, armor, trinkets (or even 
a mix) named after you or your ideas!         +Everything in the Bronze Tier
								      -Three Legendary Items Total
Diamond Tier: Become a Hero! Create a powerful NPC with a super long quest chain. You will be a reoccurring character throughout the game! +Everything in Bronze Tier.

Diamond Tier Bundle: Select two of the Silver Tier rewards, and any two of the Gold Tier Rewards and also receive the Become a Legendary reward.  In addition, you will be mailed a Roamin the Paladin T-Shirt,  a signed copy of the first season of Unforgotten Realms, and a collector's edition of UQ (physical copy).

Diamond Tier Boss Bundle! Create a Boss, but also receive everything in the
Diamond Tier Bundle, as well. This is for those of you who want to 
create an entire quest chain of a Boss or create some amazing epics 
to go with it. The Boss Bundle gives you even more flexbility in
customizing the encounter you will create with Rob!
							     +Everything in the Bronze Tier
+Includes the Diamond Tier Bundle

Diamond Tier Hero Bundle! Create a Hero NPC, but also receive everything in 
the Diamond Tier Bundle to go with it. Create an entire story for your 
character with him dying, becoming an Elite Monster, and then
dropping a Legendary weapon from the Diamond Tier Bundle you
get to desgin, as well. For those who want more characters to play 
with when creating your Hero NPC.
							     +Everything in the Bronze Tier
+Includes the Diamond Tier Bundle

Carl's Deals: Become the Inn Keeper of Cotswell ! There’s a monster
in your basement, what is it? A secret passage located in the Inn,
where is it? Your wife/husband/cat is a very important person in
Cotswell, who is it? You get to be the Inn Keeper of Cotswell, a quest
NPC who has a lot of problems and a lot of gold!
								     +Everything in the Bronze Tier								     +Includes the Diamond Tier Bundle

Carl's Deals: Become a Mountain! Carl had a mountain named after 
himself, but he’s giving it up to the Kickstarter. You’re going to be
huge and nobody is going to enjoy quests that involve climbing to
the top of you. I would recommend using your Legendary from the
Diamond Tier Bundle on creating an item all about climbing to the
top of yourself, or at least a hidden spell for the class you want to
play, to teleport up there.  		                   +Everything in the Bronze Tier
+Includes the Diamond Tier Bundle

Carl's Deals: Become a Talking Statue! There is a huge hidden statue
that you get to be. This statue has a problem, it’s most likely the fact
that someone/something/your car has turned it into a statue and
needs help being freed, but I guess that’s up for you to decide
because you’ll have a lot of time going no where as this giant marble
piece of ancient hidden artwork.  		     +Everything in the Bronze Tier
								     +Includes the Diamond Tier Bundle

Carl's Deals: Become Carl the Kobold’s Brother! Carl will do anything
to be in a video game, even sell out his own family! You get to be
Carl the Kobold’s little or big brother. Heck, maybe you aren’t even a
Kobold! That would be kinda silly, but what would I know, you’re
his brother! Become a Quest NPC known as Carl’s Brother who lives
in Triton. Carl’s mom is sick and only through the quest you create
can you and adventurers prevent Carl’s mom from dying. If
nobody buys this perk, Carl’s mom will just lay there in Triton and
slowly die as you progress through the game! How terrible!
								     +Everything in the Bronze Tier					     +Includes the Diamond Tier Bundle

Carl's Deals: Sing a Duet with Rob! Okay. So your character is gonna
stand next to a character I make with it in game, and we’re gonna
record ourselves singing a song. We’ll be like a travelling team of
bards, only we just stand there singing this song on repeat. I’ll write
the song with you based on whatever silly ideas you throw at me. If
you don’t have a good mic to record yourself singing, I’ll even sing
on behalf of you pretending to be you. That’s kinda weird, but
whatever it takes to get this project funded!
								     +Everything in the Bronze Tier						     +Includes the Diamond Tier Bundle

Carl's Deals: Be on the Cover of the Game’s Box! You’re just a typical
quest NPC. You give out some boring quest to go kill boars, but man
that doesn’t even matter because your character gets to be on the
cover of the game’s box. You’ll most likely just be in the corner
giving a thumbs up and looking kinda lame, but at least you’ll be
able to now offer signatures to other Unforgotten Quest nerd fans
on their box covers. Your character also does nothing but brag
about this fact in game. 
								     +Everything in the Bronze Tier
+Includes the Diamond Tier Bundle

Carl's Deals: Become the Real Carl the Kobold’s Brother! That other
guy is a fake, and you can prove it.... for $87.50! That’s right, you’re a
detective kobold who has discovered that this so called Carl’s 
Brother, that someone else buys, is a fake. You got the evidence, but 
where is it? Who has it? What do we gotta kill to get this hard 
evidence? I bet it’s a bunch of bosses, isn’t it? Become a Quest NPC 
that helps adventures solve the case of who wasted 750 bucks to 
become the fake Carl the Kobold’s brother.
								     +Everything in the Bronze Tier						     +Includes the Diamond Tier Bundle

God Tier: Create an entire zone in the game with Rob. We'll bang our heads together to create the area, the NPC'S in it, the quests, the monsters and even the bosses and items players will find.\r\n+Bronze, Silver, Gold, and Diamond Tiers
God Tier: Create A Class. Design a class with Rob. and recieve Hero Diamond Bundle.
God Tier: Design a Race. Rob will personally fly to where you live, have dinner with you, give you three high fives, and sit down and design a Race with you to be added to the game. +All other Tiers.
